Package bll

Class Restaurant

java.lang.Object
bll.Restaurant
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestaurantProcessingAdmin, IRestaurantProcessingWaiter, Observable, FileWorker, java.io.Serializable
public class Restaurant
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Observable, IRestaurantProcessingAdmin, IRestaurantProcessingWaiter, FileWorker
Clasa principala a proiectului. Aici se definesc toate metodele cu care restaurantul lucreaza
